com.percussion.utils.jdbc
Class PSConnectionHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.utils.jdbc.PSConnectionHelper

public class PSConnectionHelper
extends Object

Create connections using the correct mechanisms for objects that obey the IPSConnectionInfo interface. createInstance(IPSDatasourceManager) must be called before this class can be used.

Method Summary
static PSConnectionHelper createInstance(com.percussion.utils.jdbc.IPSDatasourceManager dsMgr)
          Singleton accessor, used to obtain an instance to initialize the datasource manager.
static PSConnectionDetail getConnectionDetail()
          Convenience method that calls getConnectionDetail(null) to get the repository connection detail.
static PSConnectionDetail getConnectionDetail(IPSConnectionInfo info)
          Get the connection detail for a datasource configuration.
static Connection getDbConnection()
          Convenience method that calls getDbConnection(null) to get the repository connection.
static Connection getDbConnection(IPSConnectionInfo info)
          Grab a connection from the datasource referenced
static Properties getHibernateProperties(IPSConnectionInfo info)
          Get the hibernate properties for the supplied info object, which includes: hibernate.connection.datasource hibernate.default_catalog hibernate.default_schema hibernate.dialect as well as any other properties specified in the server's configuration.

Method Detail

getDbConnection

public static Connection getDbConnection(IPSConnectionInfo info)
                                  throws NamingException,
                                         SQLException
Grab a connection from the datasource referenced

Parameters:
info - the connection info, may be null to use the repository connection.
Returns:
the connection, never null
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if createInstance(IPSDatasourceManager) has not been called.
NamingException - if the datasource is not found
SQLException - on other database errors
PSMissingDatasourceConfigException - if the info cannot be resolved to a datasource configuration.

getDbConnection

public static Connection getDbConnection()
                                  throws NamingException,
                                         SQLException
Convenience method that calls getDbConnection(null) to get the repository connection.

Throws:
NamingException
SQLException

getConnectionDetail

public static PSConnectionDetail getConnectionDetail(IPSConnectionInfo info)
                                              throws NamingException,
                                                     SQLException
Get the connection detail for a datasource configuration.

Parameters:
info - Specifies the datasource configuration to use, may be null to use the repository connection.
Returns:
The detail, never null.
Throws:
SQLException - If there is an error getting the detail from the connection.
NamingException - If there is an error looking up the datasource.
IllegalStateException - if createInstance(IPSDatasourceManager) has not been called.
PSMissingDatasourceConfigException - if the info cannot be resolved to a datasource configuration.

getConnectionDetail

public static PSConnectionDetail getConnectionDetail()
                                              throws NamingException,
                                                     SQLException
Convenience method that calls getConnectionDetail(null) to get the repository connection detail.

Throws:
NamingException
SQLException

createInstance

public static PSConnectionHelper createInstance(com.percussion.utils.jdbc.IPSDatasourceManager dsMgr)
Singleton accessor, used to obtain an instance to initialize the datasource manager.

Parameters:
dsMgr - The datasource manager, may not be null.
Returns:
The instance, never null.

getHibernateProperties

public static Properties getHibernateProperties(IPSConnectionInfo info)
                                         throws NamingException,
                                                SQLException
Get the hibernate properties for the supplied info object, which includes:
  • hibernate.connection.datasource
  • hibernate.default_catalog
  • hibernate.default_schema
  • hibernate.dialect
as well as any other properties specified in the server's configuration.

Parameters:
info - Specifies the datasource configuration to use, may be null to use the repository connection.
Returns:
The properties, never null, will contain the datasource specific properties derived from the supplied connection info as well as any other properties specified by the server's configuration.
Throws:
NamingException - If there is an error looking up the datasource.
SQLException - If there is an error obtaining the connection details for the specified datasource.
